messages-path.description: This is the context path for the messages endpoint

sse-path.description: This is the context path for the SSE endpoint

path.description: The path to the WASM binary.

relative-to.description: The fpath to which the path is relative to.

bolt-url.description: The Bolt URL to connect to the Neo4J server.

chat-language-model.description: The chat language model name of the model used to create cypher queries.

credential-reference.description: Credential (from Credential Store) to authenticate to Neo4J.

store.description: The name of the credential store holding the alias to credential

alias.description: The alias which denotes stored secret or credential in the store

type.description: The type of credential this reference is denoting

clear-text.description: Secret specified using clear text (check credential store way of supplying credential/secrets to services)

prompt-template.description: The prompt template used by the chat language model to create cypher queries.

username.description: The username to connect to Neo4J.

args.description: The arguments to pass to the command to use to start the MCP Stdio server.

cmd.description: The command to use to start the MCP Stdio server.

embedding-store-content-retriever.description: A ContentRetriever that retrieves content from an embedding store.

*.description: A ContentRetriever that retrieves content from an embedding store.

embedding-model.description: Embedding model used to compute embeddings.

embedding-store.description: Store were the contents and embeddings are retrieved from.

max-results.description: The maximum number of contents to retrieve.

min-score.description: The minimum relevance score for the returned contents.Contents scoring below this score are excluded from the results.

embedding-class.description: The class from which the embedding model will be instanciated

module.description: The module to load the embedding model from

connect-timeout.description: Timeout for the MCP SSE client.

log-requests.description: Enabling the tracing of requests of the MCP SSE client.

log-responses.description: Enabling the tracing of responses of the MCP SSE client.

socket-binding.description: The outbound socket binding to connect to the MCP server.

sse-path.description: The URL path to append to access the MCP server SSE endpoint.

ssl-enabled.description: True if the connection to the he MCP server is https or not.

api-key.description: API key to authenticate to an OpenAI chat model.

base-url.description: Endpoint to connect to an OpenAI chat model.

connect-timeout.description: Timeout for the OpenAI chat model.

frequency-penalty.description: Frequency penalty of the OpenAI chat model.

log-requests.description: Enabling the tracing of requests going to OpenAI.

log-responses.description: Enabling the tracing of responses from OpenAI.

max-token.description: The number of token retruned by the OpenAI chat model.

model-name.description: Name of the model served by OpenAI.

organization-id.description: Name of the organization id served by OpenAI.

presence-penalty.description: Presence penalty of the OpenAI chat model.

response-format.description: The format of the response from OpenAI.

seed.description: Seed of the OpenAI chat model.

streaming.description: Whether to create a token streaming chat language model or not.

temperature.description: Temperature of the OpenAI chat model.

top-p.description: Top P of the OpenAI chat model.

in-memory-embedding-store.description: In memory embedding store for AI.

*.description: In memory embedding store for AI.

path.description: The actual filesystem path to be loaded as content of the in-memory embedding store. Treated as an absolute path, unless the 'relative-to' attribute is specified, in which case the value is treated as relative to that path.

relative-to.description: Reference to a filesystem path defined in the "paths" section of the server configuration.

web-search-content-retriever.description: Content retriever using web search results.

*.description: Content retriever using web search results.

google.description: The custom Google web search engine configuration.

api-key.description: The Google Search API key for accessing the Google Custom Search API.

connect-timeout.description: Timeout for the custom Google search.

custom-search-id.description: The Custom Search ID parameter for search the entire web

include-images.description: If it is true then include public images relevant to the query. This can add more latency to the search.

max-retries.description: The maximum number of retries for API requests.

site-restrict.description: If your Search Engine is restricted to only searching specific sites, you can set this parameter to true.

base-url.description: The base url to access Tavily API.

connect-timeout.description: Timeout for the Tavily API to respond.

exclude-domains.description: A list of domains to specifically exclude from the search results.

include-answer.description: Include answers in the search results.

include-domains.description: A list of domains to specifically include in the search results.

include-raw-content.description: Include raw content in the search results.

search-depth.description: The depth of the search. It can be basic or advanced. Default is basic for quick results and advanced for indepth high quality results but longer response time. Advanced calls equals 2 requests.

fail-if-one-server-fails.description: If this is true, then the tool provider will throw an exception if it fails to list tools from any of the servers otherwise the tool provider will ignore the error and continue with the next server.

mcp-clients.description: List of MCP clients used to provide tools.

allowed-code-execution.description: Enables the model to generate and run Python code and learn iteratively from the results until it arrives at a final output.

api-key.description: API key to authenticate to a Google Gemini chat model.

civic-integrity.description: Defines the threshold to filter out civic integrity content.

connect-timeout.description: Timeout for the Google Gemini chat model.

dangerous-content.description: Defines the threshold to filter out dangerous content.

harassement.description: Defines the threshold to filter out harassement content.

hate-speech.description: Defines the threshold to filter out hate speech content.

include-code-execution-output.description: Enables providing the code and the result in the ouptut.

log-requests-responses.description: Enabling the tracing of requests and responses to Google Gemini

max-output-token.description: The number of token retruned by the Google Gemini chat model.

model-name.description: Name of the model served by Google Gemini .

response-format.description: The format of the response from Google Gemini.

sexually-explicit.description: Defines the threshold to filter out sexually explicit content.

streaming.description: Whether to create a token streaming chat language model or not.

temperature.description: Temperature of the Google Gemini chat model.

top-k.description: TopK of the Google Gemini chat model.

top-p.description: TopP of the Google Gemini chat model.

avoid-dups.description: If true the object id is a hashed ID based on provided text segment else a random ID will be generated.

consistency-level.description: How the consistency is tuned when writting into weaviate embedding store.

metadata.description: The list of metadata keys to sotre with an embedding content.

object-class.description: The object class under which the embeddings are stored.

socket-binding.description: The outbound socket binding to connect to the Weaviate store.

ssl-enabled.description: True if the connection to the Weaviate store is https or not.

api-key.description: API key to authenticate to a Github Models chat model.

connect-timeout.description: Timeout for the Github Models chat model.

custom-headers.description: Headers added to the requests to Github Models.

endpoint.description: Endpoint to connect to an Github Models chat model.

frequency-penalty.description: Frequency penalty of the Github Models chat model.

log-requests-responses.description: Enabling the tracing of requests and responses to Github Models.

max-retries.description: The number of token retris when sending a request to Github Models.

max-token.description: The number of token retruned by the Github Models chat model.

model-name.description: Name of the model served by Github Models.

presence-penalty.description: Presence penalty of the Github Models chat model.

response-format.description: The format of the response from Github Models.

seed.description: Seed of the Github Models chat model.

service-version.description: Version of Github Models to use.

streaming.description: Whether to create a token streaming chat language model or not.

temperature.description: Temperature of the Github Models chat model.

top-p.description: Top P of the Github Models chat model.

api-key.description: API key to authenticate to an Mitral AI chat model.

connect-timeout.description: Timeout for the Mitral AI chat model.

log-requests.description: Enabling the tracing of requests going to Mitral AI.

log-responses.description: Enabling the tracing of responses from Mitral AI.

max-token.description: The number of token retruned by the OpenAI chat model.

model-name.description: Name of the model served by Mitral AI.

random-seed.description: Seed of the Mitral AI chat model.

response-format.description: The format of the response from Mitral AI.

safe-prompt.description: Whether to inject a safety prompt before all conversations.

streaming.description: Whether to create a token streaming chat language model or not.

temperature.description: Temperature of the Mitral AI chat model.

top-p.description: Top P of the Mitral AI chat model.
